advancements.charmony.mooblooms.title: Mooblooms
advancements.charmony.mooblooms.descript: Mooblooms spawn flowers where they walk and can be milked for suspicious stew.
advancements.charmony.milked_moobloom.de: Milk a Moobloom and get some suspicious stew
advancements.charmony.milked_rare_mooblo: Find and milk a rare moobloom
advancements.charmony.sheared_moobloom.d: Use shears on a Moobloom to get a flower
